channel.title: CVE Feed for quantumcloud -- Slider Hero with Animation, Video Background
channel.description: The latest CVEs for quantumcloud -- Slider Hero with Animation, Video Background

item.title: CVE-2021-4424|2024-10-21T18:09:22.228Z -- quantumcloud -- slider%20hero%20with%20animation%2C%20video%20background
item.description: The Slider Hero plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 8.2.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the qc_slider_hero_duplicate() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to duplicate slides via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
